title: The Mystery of the Mary Celeste 1935 Horror) Directed by Denison Clift | with Bela Lugosi

sources.title: The Mystery of the Mary Celeste 1935 Horror) Directed by Denison Clift | with Bela Lugosi
sources.description:
The drama begins at New York Harbor, where the Mary Celeste is ready to sail.  Captain Benjamin Briggs (Arthur Margetson) and his new bride Sarah (Shirley Grey) face a stormy voyage as tensions rise and crew members mysteriously "disappear" one by one. With the enigmatic Anton Lorenzen (BÃ©la Lugosi) harboring dark secrets, the ship's journey spirals into chaos, leaving only an eerie, abandoned vessel adrift in the Atlantic.

Original title: The Mystery of the Mary Celeste (1935)
Alternative Title: Phantom Ship

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/d6mSzFG0E0o

Director: Denison Clift
Writers: Denison Clift, Charles Larkworthy
Stars: Bela Lugosi, Shirley Grey, Arthur Margetson
Genres: Drama, Horror, Mystery


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
